name: Saint Seiya: The Hades
description:
THE BEGINNING OF A NEW HOLY WAR

After being restrained for 243 years by Athena's might, the Specters begin to claim their powers back, thanks to the awakening of Hades -- King of the Underworld. It is your destiny to do battle with the supreme commander of Hell and his armies to overcome the impending devastation.
Saint Seiya: Meiou Hades Juunikyuu-hen is a Fighting video game published by Bandai, Bandai Namco Games released on September 29th, 2006 for the PlayStation 2.
